title: iOMEGA paired data platform schema JuNo
description: This is the JSON schema for paired genomic / metabolomic data.

submitter_name.title: Name of contact for correspondence
submitter_name.description: This person will be the point of contact for any communication related to this entry.

submitter_institution.title: Academic institution or company name
submitter_institution.description: Please use the full, official name of your institute in English. E.g., 'Harvard University'.

PI_name.title: Name of the principal investigator of the submitter
PI_name.description: This person is contacted in case the submitter has moved institution

PI_institution.title: Academic institution or company name
PI_institution.description: Please use the full, official name of your institute in English. E.g., 'Harvard University'.

Data to Link.title: Parameters on experiment/sample level: metagenome/genome assemblies + metabolomics datasets

metagenome_genome sequence_assemblies.title: Metagenome/genome details
metagenome_genome sequence_assemblies.description: Please provide basic information on all publicly available metagenomes/genomes for which paired data is available

genome_type.title: Please select genome, metagenome, or metagenome-assembled genome

GenBank_accession.title: GenBank accession number
GenBank_accession.description: If the publicly available genome got a GenBank accession number assigned, e.g., AL645882, please provide it here. The genome sequence must be submitted to GenBank/ENA/DDBJ (and an accession number must be received) before this form can be filled out. In case of a whole genome sequence, please use master records.
GenBank_accession.default: None, there is a RefSeq ID

RefSeq_accession.title: RefSeq accession number
RefSeq_accession.description: If the publicly available genome got a RefSeq accession number assigned, e.g., NC_003888.3, please provide it here. The genome sequence must be submitted to GenBank/ENA/DDBJ (and an accession number must be received) before this form can be filled out. In case of a whole genome sequence, please use master records.
RefSeq_accession.default: None, there is a GenBank ID

ENA_NCBI_accession.title: ENA/NCBI accession number
ENA_NCBI_accession.description: If the publicly available metagenome got a ENA/NCBI accession number assigned, e.g., GCA_900283375, please provide it here. The metagenome sequence must be submitted to GenBank/ENA/MGnify (and an accession number must be received) before this form can be filled out.
ENA_NCBI_accession.default: None, there is a MGnify ID

MGnify_accession.title: MGnify accession number
MGnify_accession.description: If the publicly available metagenome got a ENA/NCBI accession number assigned, e.g., MGYA00067671, please provide it here. The metagenome sequence must be submitted to GenBank/ENA/MGnify (and an accession number must be received) before this form can be filled out.
MGnify_accession.default: None, there is a ENA/NCBI ID

BioSample_accession.title: BioSample accession number
BioSample_accession.description: If publicly available metadata is available at BioSamples, please provide the BioSample accession number, e.g. SAMEA3648350, here. We encourage depositing metadata following a standardized ontology to enable proper reuse of the data.

publications.title: Key publications associated with this genome or metagenome
publications.description: Publications describing the genome or metagenome. Please input PubMed IDs (PMIDs, not PMCIDs!), separated by commas: e.g., '12000953,8843436'. Only enter numeric characters and commas. If a PMID is not available, a DOI can be entered instead (without the designation 'DOI' itself, e.g. '10.1039/c4sc01927j')

Metabolomics_details.title: Metabolomics project details
Metabolomics_details.description: Please provide basic information on the publicly available metabolomics project from which paired data is available. Currently, we allow for links to mass spectrometry data deposited in GNPS-MaSSIVE.

mass_spec_experiment_GNPSMaSSIVE_ID.title: GNPS-massIVE identifier
mass_spec_experiment_GNPSMaSSIVE_ID.description: Please provide the GNPS-massIVE identifier of your metabolomics data set, e.g., MSV000078839.

MaSSIVE_upload_URL.title: Link to massIVE upload
MaSSIVE_upload_URL.description: Please provide the link to the massIVE upload, e.g., https://gnps.ucsd.edu/ProteoSAFe/result.jsp?task=a507232a787243a5afd69a6c6fa1e508&view=advanced_view.

publications.title: Key publications associated with this metabolomics data set
publications.description: Publications describing the metabolomics experiment and samples. Please input PubMed IDs (PMIDs, not PMCIDs!), separated by commas: e.g., '12000953,8843436'. Only enter numeric characters and commas. If a PMID is not available, a DOI can be entered instead (without the designation 'DOI' itself, e.g. '10.1039/c4sc01927j')

MolecularNetwork.title: Molecular Network Task ID
MolecularNetwork.description: If run, please provide the task ID of the Molecular Network job. It can be found in the URL of the Molecular Networking job, i.e., in https://gnps.ucsd.edu/ProteoSAFe/status.jsp?task=c36f90ba29fe44c18e96db802de0c6b9 the task ID is c36f90ba29fe44c18e96db802de0c6b9.

Experimental_details.title: Metabolomics experimental details
Experimental_details.description: Please provide basic information about the Sample Preparation, Extraction Details, and Instrumental Methods used. Give each Assay a number that you will use to link with genomic and metabolomic data.

Sample_Preparation.title: Sample Preparation details for strain growth or metagenomic source.

Sample Preparation Number.title: Sample Preparation Number
Sample Preparation Number.description: Please assign a Sample Preparation Number for this set of sample details. If different sample preparations were used, enter them under a new Sample Preparation Number for each set of sample preparation parameters.

Growth conditions.title: Growth medium
Growth conditions.description: Please select a growth medium used in the experiment. If it is not present, please select Other and add it in the Other growth conditions section at the end. For strains grown in culture, please fill in the first five sections. For metagenomic samples, only metagenomic source is necessary.
enum: Difco nutrient agar or broth (DNA or DNB)

Medium type.title: Medium type
Medium type.description: Please select liquid or solid medium.

Growing time.title: Growth time
Growing time.description: Please enter the length of growth time in hours.

Growth temperature.title: Growth temperature
Growth temperature.description: Please enter the temperature of growth in degrees Celcius.

Aeration.title: Aeration
Aeration.description: Please select shaking or not shaking.

Other growth conditions.title: Other growth conditions
Other growth conditions.description: Please describe any other relevant growth conditions e.g. light 12h, dark 12h. If you selected Other for growth medium, please write your growth medium here.

Metagenomic host or environment.title: Metagenome host or isolation source
Metagenomic host or environment.description: For metagenomic samples, please select the source host or isolation source. If it is not available, please list it in the metagenomic sample description below.

Metagenomic sample description.title: Metagenomic sample description
Metagenomic sample description.description: Please describe your metagenomic sample preparation prior to extraction. If you answered Other is the question above, please enter the host/isolation source here.

Extraction Methods.title: Extraction Methods
Extraction Methods.description: Please provide basic details about the extraction solvents and procedures used.

Extraction_Methods_Number.title: Extraction Method Number
Extraction_Methods_Number.description: Please assign an Extraction Method Number for this set of extraction details. If more than one method of extration was used, please create a new Extraction Method Number for each set of details.

Extraction solvent(s).title: Extraction solvent(s)
Extraction solvent(s).description: Please select the organic solvent used to extract the sample. If your sovent is not listed or you used multiple solvents, please select other and enter them.

Other extraction parameters.title: Other extraction details
Other extraction parameters.description: Please describe any other relevant extraction methods, e.g. partitioned against water or fractionated with 20% acetonitrile. If you selected Other above, please write the extraction solvent here.

Instrumentation Methods.title: Instrumentation Methods
Instrumentation Methods.description: Please provide basic information on the type of LCMS instrumentation and protocols used in this experiment.

Instrumentation_Method.title: Instrumentation Method Number
Instrumentation_Method.description: Please assign an Instrumentation Method Number for this set of instrumentation details. If more than one LCMS method was used, please create a new Instrumentation Method Number for each condition.

instrument_type.title: Instrument type
instrument_type.description: Please select the type of LCMS instrumentation used. If your instrument type is not listed, please select Other and write it in the Other instrumentation information section below.

Column parameters.title: Column details
Column parameters.description: Please select reverse or normal phase. You can add additional column details in the Other Instrumentation Information section below.

LCMS mode.title: Instrument mode
LCMS mode.description: Please select positive or negative mode.

Other LCMS parameters.title: Other instrumentation information
Other LCMS parameters.description: Please enter any other relevant instrument details, e.g. collision energy. If you answered Other above, please provide instrumente type here.

Genome_Metabolome_links.title: Links between genomes and metabolomics data
Genome_Metabolome_links.description: Please provide the genome/metagenome accession number as earlier provided and subsequently sample names of and links to one or more metabolomics data files beloning to that genome.

Genome_Metagenome_ID.title: Linked Genome/Metagenome Accession ID
Genome_Metagenome_ID.description: Please fill out the Genome/Metagenome accession number to be linked to one or more metabolomics data files.

Metabolomics_data.title: Metabolomics data file or files to be linked. Currently we support links to GNPS-massIVE.

Metabolomics_File_Names.title: File name of metabolomics data file to be linked
Metabolomics_File_Names.description: Please provide the metabolomics data file name to be linked without any extensions, i.e., for CNB091_R5_M.mzXML this would be CNB091_R5_M.

Metabolomics_Data_Files.title: Location of metabolomics data file
Metabolomics_Data_Files.description: Please provide a direct link to the metabolomics data file location, e.g., ftp://massive.ucsd.edu/MSV000078839//spectrum/R5/CNB091_R5_M.mzXML, that provides access to CNB091_R5_M.mzXML.

Sample Preparation Number.title: Sample Preparation Number
Sample Preparation Number.description: Please provide the Sample Preparation Number for this linked dataset.

Extraction Method Number.title: Extraction Method Number
Extraction Method Number.description: Please provide the Extraction Method Number for this linked dataset

Instrumentation Method Number.title: Instrumentation Method Number
Instrumentation Method Number.description: Please provide the Instrumentation Method Number for this linked dataset

gene_cluster_ms2_spectra_links.title: Linked gene clusters and MS2 spectra.

Known_links.title: Known linked gene cluster and molecule
Known_links.description: If you already know of a gene cluster or gene cluster family that can be linked to a molecule or molecular family, please provide a brief description here including the name of the molecule(s).

BGC_ID.title: Biosynthetic gene cluster file
BGC_ID.description: Please provide the MIBiG cluster number or URL for antiSMASH cluster output.

MS2_GNPS_number.title: GNPS cluster index
MS2_GNPS_number.description: Please provide the GNPS cluster index number or URL to the corresponding MS2. If you provide a URL, please indicate a scan number below.

MS2_scan_number.title: MS2 scan number
MS2_scan_number.description: Please provide the scan number for the MS2 to link,

verification.title: Link verification
verification.description: Please indicate if verification of the link between BGC and MS2 is experimentally validated or bioinformatically inferred.
